title: Patient-Reported Outcomes in Older Adults With Transthyretin Amyloid Cardiomyopathy - JACC

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: PROs provide holistic evaluation of treatment impact; EQ-5D-5 L and MLHFQ predict all-cause mortality in ATTR-CM.
**TACTICAL WIN**: [SHIP NOW] Implement ePRO solutions with validated questionnaires (KCCQ, NYHA) for real-time patient monitoring and decision-making.
**MARKET SIGNAL**: ðŸ”´ URGENT - FDA approval trends favor PRO-based endpoints; competitors may adopt similar strategies.
